Articles.Content:
After my hugely successful Vertibird http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/41128-Stock-Vertibird-VTOL?highlight=vertibird I was finding it hard to create a successor that matched the agility and balance of the Vertibird. Enter the mallard: a faster, even more agile plane. This thing will literally fly wherever you point the nose. No SAS is needed as the craft is perfectly balanced, but you have to be delicate with the controls sometimes!

Craft File: https://www.dropbox.com/s/bq36au5r0h8ndm5/Mallard%20VTOL.craft

Controls-

1-Vertical Engines

2-Horizontal Engines

3-Antenne

Enjoy!
That looks... so... so... COOL That's an awesome design and considering my poor luck with VTOLs that may not be much of a compliment.
